name: Evans

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: I help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: I design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: I build and optimize your online presence through incorporating riveting functionality for your user.Your Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: I combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara: In Moringa School, I have been able to acquire this set of skills needed to develop a functional website.I have learnt a couple of frameworks and developed many projects listed in my gitHub account.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class websites and applications to a couple of clients. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.position: Full Stack engineer at Riveria trading Solutions
